tool_description: Generates unique content angles and perspectives for topics based on audience insights and current trends.

topic.description: Main topic to generate angles for

target_audience.description: Primary target audience for the content

content_format.description: Intended content format: article, video, podcast, infographic, social_post

tone.description: Desired content tone: professional, casual, humorous, educational, inspirational

error_messages: Invalid content format: Use one of [article, video, podcast, infographic, social_post]
Invalid tone: Use one of [professional, casual, humorous, educational, inspirational]
Invalid angle count: Must be integer between 1-20
Empty topic: Provide a specific topic to generate angles for
Empty target audience: Specify the target audience for the content
usage: Specify topic and target_audience, optionally set content_format, tone, and angle_count. Returns creative content angles with descriptions.

angle_titles.description: Catchy titles for each content angle

angle_descriptions.description: Detailed descriptions of each angle approach

audience_appeal.description: Audience appeal scores (1-10) for each angle

implementation_difficulty.description: Implementation difficulty for each angle: easy, medium, hard
